## blockRendering.MarkerSvg.positionPrevious\_() method

Position the marker for a previous connection. Displays a half rectangle with a notch in the top to represent the previous connection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected positionPrevious_(width: number, markerOffset: number, markerHeight: number, connectionShape: Notch | PuzzleTab): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  width | number | The width of the block. |
|  markerOffset | number | The offset of the marker from around the block. |
|  markerHeight | number | The height of the marker. |
|  connectionShape | Notch \| PuzzleTab | The shape object for the connection. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
